name: run-groups
readme:
# run-groups

> Runs a sequence of concurrent task groups

## Installation

```
<npm|yarn|pnpm> add run-groups
```

## Usage

```ts
import runGroups from 'run-groups'

await runGroups(10, [
  [
    async () => {},
    async () => {},
  ],
  [
    async () => {},
    async () => {},
    async () => {},
  ],
  [
    async () => {},
  ],
])
```
